name: Psyche Soldier VR
description: Got skill? Like dynamic action? Then Psyche Soldier VR is for you... and will take you to battles inside the psychedelic realm of your subconscious, tackling shadow creatures using five different Caster light-energy attacks, a channel ability, a spotlight, and an active Power Up. Challenge yourself!
minimum_requirements: OS: Win 7 or higher Processor: Intel i5 or higher Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GTX 970 or higher DirectX: Version 10 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 780 MB available space Sound Card: Integrated
recommended_requirements: OS: Win 10 Processor: Intel i7 Memory: 16 GB RAM Graphics: GTX 980 or higher DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 1 GB available space Sound Card: Integrated
